AzureBlobStorageConfig.AzureBlobStorageConnectionString: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR AZURE CONNECTION STRING ---
AzureBlobStorageConfig.AzureBlobStorageContainerName: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR AZURE CONTAINER NAME ---
AzureBlobStorageConfig.AzureBlobStorageEndPoint: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR AZURE END POINT ---

AmazonS3Config.AmazonAwsAccessKeyId: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR AMAZON ACCESS KEY ID ---
AmazonS3Config.AmazonAwsSecretAccessKey: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR AMAZON SECRET ACCESS KEY ---
AmazonS3Config.AmazonBucketName: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR AZURE AMAZON BUCKET NAME ---

GoogleCloudStorageConfig.GoogleProjectId: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR GOOGLE PROJECT ID ---
GoogleCloudStorageConfig.GoogleJsonAuthPath: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR GOOGLE JSON AUTH PATH ---
GoogleCloudStorageConfig.GoogleBucketName: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR GOOGLE BUCKET NAME ---

KvpbaseStorageConfig.KvpbaseApiKey: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR KVPBASE API KEY ---
KvpbaseStorageConfig.KvpbaseEndpoint: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR KVPBASE END POINT ---

FileSystemStorageConfig.Directory: --- REPLACE WITH YOUR LOCAL FILE SYSTEM DIRECTORY ---
